messages.msgSnippet: -=-=-=-=-=- ilive in illinois in jersey county. if anyone has any suggestions or answers. please help.-=-=-=-=- Don t forget the Live and Learn Unschooling
messages.messageBody:
-=-=-=-=-=- ilive in illinois in jersey county. if anyone has any suggestions or answers. please help.-=-=-=-=-


Don't forget the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference to be held in your back yard: In Fairview Heights, IL, just over the river from St Louis.

You'll be able to see real live unschooling kids and their parents (mant of them are regular posters here!).

Life changing, I promise!

~Kelly
conference coordinator
LiveandLearnConference.org
